entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
